table.name: vtiger_servicecompetency
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicecompetency` ( `servicecompetencyid` int NOT NULL, `consultantname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `consultantrating` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `consultantrole` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `servicename` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `working_days` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tickets_count` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `approvalstatus` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `scstatus` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicecompetencyid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_servicecompetencycf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicecompetencycf` ( `servicecompetencyid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicecompetencyid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
